entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] CI failure X64Avx_NoAvx2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 - linux x64 Native AOT #90775
    8.0.0
  • Ensure localization changes are ported to release/8.0 #90755
    8.0.0
  • AOT Crash on iOS Release build, net8p7 #90751
    8.0.0
  • Trimmed InlineArrayAttribute breaks Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #90745
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Modify static abstract interfaces for functions #90744
  • Rounding error in SqlMoney.ToInt64 #90741
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method #90732
  • Arbitrary UnhandledException Behaviour #90728
  • Math.Pow behavior deviates from documentation #90725
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #90723
    9.0.0
  • `UnreachableBlocksOptimizer.GetConstantValue` should used boxed integers instead of boxing every time #90718
  • `UnrechableBlocksOptimizer` has bad performance #90717
  • GC heap initialization failed with error 0x8013200B BEGIN: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b END: coreclr_initialize failed - Error: 0x8013200b #90715
  • Test failure JIT\\superpmi\\superpmicollect\\superpmicollect.cmd #90711
    8.0.0

Closed

  • ComInterfaceGenerator and LibraryImportGenerator tests fail on linux-arm with "symbol lookup error: /root/helix/work/workitem/e/Microsoft.Interop.Tests.NativeExportsNE.so: undefined symbol: __atomic_compare_exchange_4" #90376
    8.0.0
  • Port System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88566
    8.0.0
  • How should I debug the corehost .sln？ #89354
  • dotnet is not able to run programs compiled with csc #90080
  • Performance Regression with .NET 8 Preview 6 #90101
    8.0.0
  • build-rootfs.sh doesn't work on WSL - add to docs #77348
  • Updating .NET Linux Build for .NET 8 #83428
  • dotnet restore hangs sometimes #80230
  • Improve XunitWrapper test runner #77410
  • Incorrect matching with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #78609
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT broken on `main` #90742
  • [wasm] WBT for wasi broken on `main` #90743
  • Custom Marshallers never use stateful GetPinnableReference on struct #90621
    9.0.0
  • Port System.Linq documentation from .NET 8.0 APIs #88589
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: serialize dictionary with JsonExtensionData ignores DefaultIgnoreCondition option #90670
  • Failure in Mono run of System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Tests #89661
  • Generated docs xml files do not contain the newest APIs #90738
    8.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #90602
    8.0.0
  • The AOT compiler doesn't support a MONO_PATH with a colon #90422
    8.0.0
  • NetworkStream.ReadAsync runs slower on ubuntu than on windows #90664
    9.0.0
  • AOT: Delegate.CreateDelegate throws attempting to JIT compile method #90660
  • NET8 breaking change due to TypeForwardedTo attribute missing for PEFileKinds #90578
    8.0.0
  • Race condition in building ILLink props #90702
  • Hot Reload Fails on Microsoft Subsystem for Android & Android Emulators for .razor pages #84572
    8.0.0
  • Forking of CoreCLR process #8919
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Slightly reduce the Depth3Test that often times out on Linux #90777
    test-failure, os-linux, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update Fedora docker image to Fedora 38 #90776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Make chrome version bumps for testing explicit, instead of automatic updates to latest #90772
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • experiment #90769
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Security
  • Update 7.0 to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90767
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add note about IlcScanReflection to the native aot docs #90765
    documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Update 6.0 branch to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [main] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90756
    needs-area-label
  • `PEImage` should not expose ref to `m_path` field #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Do not build mono libs with `-msimd128` #90750
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90749
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix some errors after the kernel supporting SIMD. #90734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Mono - CordbProcess::GetThread implementation #90733
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Use the image's ALC instead of the default one only if exists #90731
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix invalid PGO optimization path on Nuget cache containing spaces. #90729
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] new synchronization mechnism for DATAS #90726
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve linker performance by avoiding IndexOf #90721
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix win-arm64 native varargs ABI #90712
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Update 6.0 staging branch with Ubuntu 22.04 queue for Perf runs #90763
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update 7.0 staging to use Ubuntu 22.04 queues for Perf runs #90768
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Limit language version on Logger and Options source gens #90709
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Revert changes to HasNativeCodeReJitAware #90696
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90746
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90760
    Servicing-approved, area-Host
  • [release/8.0] [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90758
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update Get/SetFieldValue to Account for EnC #90623
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90754
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0] Call SetupNuGetSources for installer jobs #90759
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Expose TC_CallCountThreshold and TC_CallCountingDelayMs as runtime knobs #90761
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Improve profiled casts #2 #90735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Temporary fix for ldp/stp optimizations - with test fix #90700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add check for tizen in ilc and crossgen2 #90310
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete support for IA64 relocs #90752
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Make some methods public that we need to call. #90689
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove quotes from language versions in source gen diagnostics. #90720
    area-Meta
  • Revert "Temporarily increase timeouts for perf jobs, because of limit… #90757
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [wasm] Pin sdk version to 8.0.100-rc.1.23415.5 for workload testing #90748
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Expose TC_CallCountThreshold and TC_CallCountingDelayMs as runtime knobs #90724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90739
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch fx_ver_t::as_str from stringstream to append/to_string #90652
    area-Host
  • Add collections with all marshaller methods on the marshallers #90706
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Pin sdk version to 8.0.100-rc.1.23415.5 for workload testing #90747
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0] [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90722
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0-rc1] Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #90668
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • Improve filtering of candidate binding invocations in config binder gen #90619
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Fix Shuffling Thunks part 2 #90707
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Disallow mismatched GC-ness for physical promotions #90694
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT][ios] Clean up building HelloiOS sample #90730
    area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] fix the compiling errors after #90318. #90713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Release the stream once the response is sent #90659
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Fix PortableRuntimeIdentifierGraph.json not found during runtime repo source build #90695
    needs-area-label
  • Add missing type forwards #90669
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Support assignment to multiple refs in trim analyzer #90287
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Assembly resolving adjustments. #90601
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Implement AppendAllBytes API #90364
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Bump main version to 9.0-alpha1 #90558
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [DRAFT][mono][aot] Implementation of nollvm init method #89074
    NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix Position and Seek for MemoryStream with custom origin #88572
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Support nocheck prefix #81615
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use Roslyn interceptors feature in binder gen #90340
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Add a head merging transformation alongside the tail merging transformation #90468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Redo IL Verification #90418
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adding PACKAGE.md to System.Runtime.Caching package #90701
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Implement IStatefulPinnedMarshalling test marshallers #90685
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SequenceReader performance; elide bounds checks and book-keeping #82765
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • proof of concept #90058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Relink for non-unicode tests should be running. #89419
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Avoid looking for dynamically accessed members when none are requested. #90154
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • test #90666
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Enable Yield_r* tests with full-AOT (llvm) #90614
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make `--skip-unresolved` the default when not running from SDK #90512
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • KeyAnalyzer tests. #90301
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Substitute constant into loop testing variable where possible #90622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check opportunistic ISAs in crossgen for CompExactlyDependsOn #90326
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The directory structure of `sdk-manifests` is changed on .Net8 Preview 7 #34706

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #34732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #34719
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] add note about supporting identity token auth for containers in .NET 8 #34718
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2246239 #34688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add note about supporting identity token auth for containers in .NET 8 #34716
    Area-Containers
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.DefaultItems.targets for .DS_Store causing build failures on MacOSX #34710
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Fix in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.DefaultItems.targets for .DS_Store causing build failures on MacOSX #34712
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Fix in Microsoft.NET.Sdk.DefaultItems.targets for .DS_Store causing build failures on MacOSX #34666
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34657
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix runtime pack selection for `dotnet build` with PublishAot=true and PublishAotUsingRuntimePack=true #34658
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Add AdditionalRuntimeIdentifier if building from source #34650
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update onelocbuild to 8.0.1xx #34642
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged
  • Backport of 'First-run workload experience #34322' to release/8.0.1xx #34694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add design proposal for workload history #30486
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back the current version of MSBuild that got removed by accident in the CPM PR #34687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Copying the test project to a unique temporary folder is to change the hard coding of the tfm and package version #34624
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SUGGESTION] Creating Constructor With All Fields Option Not Showing Anymore #69593
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Naming of "Create and assign field" is inconsistent between mac and windows #69592
    September
  • editor taking spacebar to mean acceptance of autocompletion suggestions #69591
    September
  • cw shortcut has System at the front #69590
    September
  • Refactoring to new .cs doesn't open new file in Mac [macOS] #69589
    September
  • Bugs in C# Dev Kit or VS Code #69588
    September
  • Enable DebugRoslynComponent launchSettings.json command support #69587
    Backlog
  • [SUGGESTION] Find all read / write references #69585
    Backlog
  • Prioritize language keywords over all other suggestions #69584
    Backlog
  • Codelens to get the references on fields is missing #69583
    Backlog
  • CSC : error CS7038: Failed to emit module '_': Unable to determine specific cause of the failure. #69579
  • Autodetect popular classes and prompt install of package if missing from project #69577
    September
  • [BUG] C# class extensions are not suggested for auto-complete. #69576
    August

Closed

  • FindCallersAsync not able to find all the callers specially protected one #66671
    Backlog
  • Compiler should not use `Environment` type #69516
    17.8
  • Assert when typing `await foreach` #69539
    17.8
  • Analyzer errors from vsix packages are not respected in builds. #8068
    Backlog
  • EnC: Deleting record method that shadows a synthesized one and contains stackalloc may crash the app #69493

PullRequests

Created

  • Collection expressions: overload resolution #69594
    New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add EA support to asp.net so that *they* can create instances of hte 'Add Nuget Package' code fix in a lightbulb. #69586
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions" #69582
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move helpers for 'use collection expression'. #69581
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Not ready for review. #69580
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement ref switch expressions #69575
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23408.8 #69568
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Filter out abstract types from the list of collection-initializable types #69546
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove use of Environment.CurrentDirectory #69564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Visit foreach await info in error scenarios #69573
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • IDE changes for analyzer loading #69470
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Consolidate code paths that create update edits #69545
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Semantic snippets - make `foreach` snippet work with `await` and async enumerables #69538
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update compiler toolset to latest #69544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement support for emitting PrivateImplementationDetails to EnC deltas #69485
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support creating binlogs for the language server's design time builds #69572
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Recommend `method` on primary constructors #69536
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Move csharp decompiler service down to features so it is available in vscode #69501
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Revert "remove positive Unary expressions to avoid confusion in addit… #69533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding lambda body if fully typed #69505
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update toolset to 4.8.0-1.23412.1 #69569
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for reporting non-local LSP pull document diagnostics for open documents #69541
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnableRequestDelegateGenerator fails when MapX is on its own line #50164
    8.0-rc2
  • Baggage not extracted without trace id from the request #50158
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50157
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50156
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #50155
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50154
  • Avoid computing `FormFeature` when calling `HttpRequest.HasFormContentType` #50153
  • Blazor WASM: consider adding support for one-file / single-file / atomic deployments #50148
  • Better deal with cycles in SSR Blazor component parameters #50147
    8.0-rc2
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] Fail to load local css,js with Cofoundry template. #50141
  • Blazor - Issue with SectionContent components when using @attribute [RenderModeServer(prerender:false)] #50139
  • Failed to scaffold Identity in a default Blazor Web App in .net 8 #50136
  • Poor gRPC performance on test #50135
  • WebApiAot ProjectTemplate add swagger document #50134
  • NSwag.AspNetCore instead of Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #50133
    Discussions
  • Reconsider enabling HTTP/3 by default in .NET 8 #50131
    8.0-rc1

Closed

  • Modify EventCounter usage to support the new metric APIs as well #33387
    8.0-rc1
  • Review types passed to metrics tags #48530
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Introduce an IServiceCollection extension method for enabling HTTPS configuration #49967
    8.0-rc1
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.IHttpsConfigurationService' after upgrading to .NET 8 preview #48956
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49640
  • Perf regression: caching #50109
  • [Blazor] API for enhanced page refresh #50014
    8.0-rc1
  • Ability to programmatically perform an "enhanced page refresh" #49414
    8.0-rc1
  • .Net 8 Blazor web app can be like .Net 7 Wasm Core Host? #50137
  • Dotnet 8 preview 7 - Consistent reactivation of "OnInitializedAsync" and "Dispose" on page change with Blazor #50138
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50108
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #50107
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50106
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextWithFilter #50105
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextEmptyFilter #50104
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #50103
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #50102
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #50087
  • Perf improvement: json, mvc #50077
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50061
  • Perf regression: Endpoint routing #50008
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #49985
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #49934
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, plaintext, single_query #49933
  • Perf improvement: json #49908
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextWithFilter, plainTextWithFilter #49133
  • Perf improvement: caching, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49122
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #48704
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_Query \ get_HasFormContentType #49991
  • Can't go to the View in Areas #50115
  • Can't run Blazor wasm startproject #49661
  • Add a method to efficiently bulk create users in ASP.NET Identity. #49701
  • I'm not sure what you mean by a real world example, but you can look at how the authenticator token provider as an example: https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/blob/main/src/Identity/Extensions.Core/src/AuthenticatorTokenProvider.cs #49883

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Close the circuit when all Blazor Server components are disposed #50170
    area-blazor
  • SignInManager.AuthenticationScheme rename #50169
    area-identity
  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    area-runtime, area-routing
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50167
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Resolve FormOptionsMetadata to FormOptions when reading form #50166
    feature-http-abstractions, area-middleware
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-runtime, area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Make it clear in the bot comment that repros must be GitHub repos and not ZIPs #50149
    area-infrastructure, needs-area-label
  • Persist Prerendered State #50146
    area-blazor
  • Support Keyed Services in MVC #50145
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #50150
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 8.0-rc2
  • Support resolving keyed services from DI in RDF and RDG #50095
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-rc1] [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50124
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Add APIs for "enhanced refresh" #50068
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Support hot reload for Blazor component endpoints #50031
    area-blazor

entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use a custom splash screen #16843

Closed

  • Checkbox Not Checked When Using Gesture Recognizer #16397

  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Extensions - install_Screen reader: After invoking "Install" button Screen Reader is not announcing "Installation" status. #16817
  • A11y_SQL Azure Data Studio_Extensions - install_Screen reader: After invoking "Next" button Screen Reader is not announcing "Headings" of "Data-tier Application Wizard" section. #16820
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #16778

  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout and Columns Grid #16658
